reporting-org.narrative: New Zealand Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade

title.narrative: Climate Change Programme - Reduce risk of water scarcity through improved sustainable water resource

description.narrative: Pacific Communities are vulnerable to the risks of water scarcity due to the impacts of climate change. This activity will provide at-risk communities improvements to their water infrastructure, infrastructure maintenance, training and tools to enable the communities to adapt to the impacts of climate change through effectively managing water resources, managing water demand and supply, and mitigating risks.

participating-org.narrative: New Zealand Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade
